oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Souvenir Program, The Board of the Martha O'Bryan Settlement Presents: Lucrezia Bori in Concert, 1926
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A souvenir program from a concert performed by Lucrezia Bori, a celebrated Spanish operatic singer. The show was at the Ryman Auditorium on November 26, 1926, presented by the Board of the Martha O'Bryan Settlement. The Ryman Auditorium is located downtown on Fifth Avenue North in Nashville, Tennessee. Forms part of the Naff Collection. 1 program : b & w ; 8.5 x 11 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bori, Lucrezia, 1887-1960
Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.)
